PURPOSE : This clinical trial study three different type thermometer measure temperature young patient fever without fever .
DOC.brief_title: Three Different Types Thermometers Measuring Temperature Young Patients With Fever Without Fever
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine agreement three different type temperature-measuring instrument : temporal artery scanner , digital oral thermometer , infrared tympanic thermometer calibrate oral setting , pediatric patient febrile afebrile . Secondary - Determine similarity differences percent fever detect oral , ear , temporal artery monitoring pediatric patient . - Determine difference agreement various temperature device non-neutropenic pediatric patient versus neutropenic pediatric patient . OUTLINE : This prospective study . During afebrile episode , patient 's temperature measure twice use follow 3 device : temporal artery scanner , digital oral thermometer , infrared tympanic thermometer calibrate oral setting ( total 6 temperature measurement per afebrile episode ) . During febrile episode , patient 's temperature measure twice use 3 device , 2 4 hour administration antipyretic medication ( total 18 temperature per febrile episode ) . Patients ' temperature record maximum 3 afebrile febrile episode . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 32 patient accrue study .
